name: Filippino Lechon Kawali
author: lanrover
summary: Crispy pan-fried pork belly. Mix all the sauce ingredients and serve lechon kawali while it's hot.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds pork belly, cut into small pieces
directions: Combine pork belly, garlic, bay leaves, salt, and pepper in a skillet; pour in enough water to cover
Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until skin is tender, 35 to 45 minutes
Drain and let sit at room temperature until pork has air-dried
Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Fry pork in the hot oil, working in batches, until golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes
Remove fried pork with a slotted spoon and drain on a paper towel-lined plate
